statements: UPDATE ImpactEvaluation SET location = 'New Location' WHERE program_id = '12345678-1234-5678-1234-567812345678'
UPDATE ImpactEvaluation SET start_date = '2023-01-01', end_date = '2024-01-01' WHERE program_id = '87654321-4321-8765-4321-876543218765'
UPDATE ImpactEvaluation SET beneficiaries = 1000, outcome = 'Improved outcomes for beneficiaries' WHERE program_id = '11111111-1111-1111-1111-111111111111'
UPDATE ImpactEvaluation SET location = 'New Location', beneficiaries = 100 WHERE program_id = '7480b16e-c376-4b84-a3b2-1ac06d5f0b8a';
UPDATE ImpactEvaluation SET program_name = 'Updated Program Name', beneficiaries = beneficiaries + 50 WHERE beneficiaries > 200;
UPDATE ImpactEvaluation SET outcome = CONCAT(outcome, ' - Updated Outcome') WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
UPDATE impact_evaluation SET evaluation_score = 8.5 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE program_participants SET gender = 'Male' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE impact_evaluation SET program_name = 'New Program', start_date = '2022-09-01' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE impact_evaluation SET evaluation_score = 8.7 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE program_participants SET gender = 'Female' WHERE program_id = 1 AND age > 25;
UPDATE impact_evaluation SET end_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE program_name = 'Health Program'
UPDATE Monitoring_and_Evaluating_Programs SET Budget = 15000.00 WHERE Program_ID = 1;
UPDATE Program_Participants SET Age = 30 WHERE Participant_ID = 1;
UPDATE Program_Impact SET Impact_Score = 4.5 WHERE Impact_ID = 1;
UPDATE Monitoring_and_Evaluating_Programs SET Budget = Budget * 1.1 WHERE Program_ID = 1;
UPDATE Program_Participants SET Gender = 'Female' WHERE Age < 25;
UPDATE Program_Impact SET Impact_Score = 4.5, Date_Recorded = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE Impact_ID = 3;
UPDATE ImpactEvaluation SET evaluation_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE evaluation_id = 1;
UPDATE ProgramParticipants SET participant_role = 'Manager' WHERE participant_id = 3;
UPDATE DataCollection SET data_description = 'Updated description' WHERE collection_id = 2;
UPDATE ImpactEvaluation SET humanitarian_program = 'New Program Name' WHERE evaluation_id = 1;
UPDATE ProgramParticipants SET participant_role = 'Lead Researcher' WHERE evaluation_id = 2 AND participant_name = 'John Doe';
UPDATE DataCollection SET data_description = 'Updated data description' WHERE evaluation_id = 3;
UPDATE ImpactAreas SET population = 10000 WHERE id = 1
UPDATE Programs SET budget = 50000.00 WHERE program_id = 1
UPDATE Beneficiaries SET age = 30 WHERE beneficiary_id = 1
UPDATE ImpactAreas SET population = population + 1000 WHERE region = 'Asia'
UPDATE Programs SET budget = budget * 1.1, location = 'New Location' WHERE budget > 50000
UPDATE Beneficiaries SET age = age + 1 WHERE gender = 'Female'
